column5: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/BsWcs_PTVM4" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>   Mike Haeg made this "Marcel Duchamp Inspired Ice Fishing Tip Up / Auto Jigger." He says, "this auto-jigger harnesses the power of the wind. A silver dinner bell rings when a fish bites. Perfect for catching panfish and Dadaists." It debuted this week at Art Shanty Projects.
and just for good measure.....  <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/xKDFy7T-urM" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Great site Gerritt. A lot of clever fishermen out there.
